prompts:
- engine/script-interpreter.sh:37-88 – the helper writeFile only mutates the
    in-memory context object inside Node and never persists the change back to
    context.json. As a result, deliverables produced by main-agent scripts never
    appear in our stored context/metadata, and gap checks that rely on tracked
    deliverables won’t see them. Please add a bridge (e.g., emit instructions for
    the shell to append via context-manager.sh) so these writes are durable.
  - engine/template-renderer.sh:14-67 – neither render_template nor its fallback
    ensures the destination directory exists. A workflow whose finalization
    output is outside .temp/<feature>/ (for example, plans/my-feature/plan.md)
    will fail with “No such file or directory.” Calling ensure_dir "$(dirname
    "$output_file")" before writing solves it.
okay what's next according to the plan?
